name: Souls of the Lost
description:
A few souls have gone missing from hell ... causing chaos on earth. Your task is to find these souls and take them back.

Playable with Gamepad or keyboard + mouse.

This game was the result of my first ever game jam, a week-long jam for the Game Dev Unlocked community. The theme was Lost & Found.

#Game Dev Unlocked Game Jam #2

My idea resolved around souls being lost, by escaping from hell and collecting them to 'find' them, by attacking humans which have been possessed by the demonic souls. I didn't want to spend too much time thinking about a perfect idea because I know from my experience that I will think over and over and never start if I do that.

I know the game has some bugs or 'jankiness' to it because of time constraints, but I am very happy and proud of myself for making what I believe to be my best game yet in just one week. The time pressure really helped me push through every chance I get and prioritizing tasks to make what's most important before spending too much time polishing little stuff.

If you enjoyed my work, you can follow me on Twitter @duanecreates or Instagram where I'm most active with my day-to-day progress.
